html:
PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2023-11332023-11-09ECCC
ActGreenhouse Gas Pollution Pricing Act
Environmental Violations Administrative Monetary Penalties Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Output-Based Pricing System Regulations and the Environmental Violations Administrative Monetary Penalties Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the OUTPUT-BASED PRICING SYSTEM REGULATIONS and the ENVIRONMENTAL VIOLATIONS ADMINISTRATIVE MONETARY PENALTIES REGULATIONS in order to (1) add an annual tightening rate to most output-based standards, such that the Output-Based Pricing System (OBPS) will continue to met its objective by maintaining a marginal price on emissions; (2) introduce new and update existing output-based standards; (3) improve implementation; (4) ensure accurate reporting; and (5) streamline voluntary participation.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2023-0240 Publication Date: 2023-11-22
AttachmentsAttachment
act: Greenhouse Gas Pollution Pricing ActEnvironmental Violations Administrative Monetary Penalties Act
subject: Regulations Amending the Output-Based Pricing System Regulations and the Environmental Violations Administrative Monetary Penalties Regulations
precis: Regulations Amending the OUTPUT-BASED PRICING SYSTEM REGULATIONS and the ENVIRONMENTAL VIOLATIONS ADMINISTRATIVE MONETARY PENALTIES REGULATIONS in order to (1) add an annual tightening rate to most output-based standards, such that the Output-Based Pricing System (OBPS) will continue to met its objective by maintaining a marginal price on emissions; (2) introduce new and update existing output-based standards; (3) improve implementation; (4) ensure accurate reporting; and (5) streamline voluntary participation.
